name: Xojo Toolbar File
summary: Learn about .XOJO_TOOLBAR files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Xojo toolbars can be saved in three different formats depending on the selected project format. The formats include: Project (text), Binary, and XML. You must have a product license in order to create the XOJO_TOOLBAR file.

To create the XOJO_TOOLBAR file, select Insert → Toolbar, and then name the toolbar. After you create the toolbar, select it from the left panel, then select File → Export [toolbar name]..., choose the save location, and click Save.
To import a XOJO_TOOLBAR, select File → Import..., navigate to the file, and click Import.
NOTE: REAL Software Real Studio became Xojo, Inc. Xojo in 2013.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
